long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Cometly Pixel Helper will help you check for errors in your Cometly base code pixel installation, identify the Cometly browser events loading on your page, and verify the Cometly base code is automatically capturing data on your opt in forms.

Cometly is a marketing attribution and customer data platform that uses first party data to accurately track events for any activity in your marketing & sales funnel and feed accurate data back to the ad platforms.
